Team Fortress is a challenging shooter. I won't say i dislike it but i do despise the unfair matches and the sour opponents. It would be great if they added a level XP randomizer. Other than that I love the wide variety of weapons! By far my favorite classes are Spy , heavy , and scout all from RED
I really enjoyed my time with this.

In its golden days, was hands down the best free to play game on steam. Now, valve has f**ked up a lot of stuff and the community has become full of toxic kids who think they are automatically amazing at the game :|. Its still worth playing, but for me the only reason i keep playing is because of the nostalgia for the old tf2 and the way the game has grown on me. I probably wouldn't be on so much if I started playing after casual mode replaced valve servers. Still, its better than so many games out there right now and has a unique side to it which no other game has.

Why are you reading this? This game is one of the top games on steam, as well as a very fun FPS, and it is free to play. Stop reading this review and try it already. You're still here? You want an actual review? Fine.

Pros

- Hats
- Funny characters
- This game can introduce you to friends
- Taunts (Nothing beats being a spy and going all Metal Gear Solid with the boxtrot taunt, or sneaking up behind enemy snipers while invisible only to decloak behind them and dance to disco, or having an ice cold beer as an engineer relaxing with the rancho-relaxo)

Cons

-None that I can think of off the top of my hat, which I bought, from this game.

Best F2P game ever.

I dont know what it is, but something about this game has me loving it more everyday that i play. While although it was the first game i got on steam, and i only have 600-700 hours, this game is just my favorite. This game has also trained me for so many other things in the gaming world. it helped me improve my aim and it also just improved my ability to handle the salt on the internet, and probably the biggest of all is just helping me improve my reaction times over all in life. 10/10 probably the best free game i have ever played.

For me, TF2 has been a fun and exciting game, with a variety of game modes to play. Even after 3 years of playing TF2, I am still not bored playing it and enjoy it. I hope that more updates would be around the corner, and these updates would be released in good shape without any bugs! Good luck to TF2's future!!!

Un juego muy adictivo, divertido y que hasta el dia de hoy despues de casi 12 años tiene muchisimos jugadores tanto jugando en el casual, o en los servidores comunitarios tradeando sus items.
Lo cual lo hace uno de los mejores juegos online no solo por su gran comunidad que sigue apoyando a este gran titulo, tambien por sus personajes y sus diferentes mecanicas, ya que aunque son 9 mercenarios cada uno tiene su diferente forma de jugar y por la gran coperacion que se necesita
Pero lo que en verdad hace fabuloso este juego son los escenarios y la personalidad unica que Valve le puso a sus personajes que hace que hasta el dia de hoy los sigamos amando.

I am only doing this review to get a badge so yeah.
Pretty good game Except for when Valve kicked it in the nuts after Meet your Match.

2/10 points for effort.

Variety is key when it comes to this game; cosmetics, weapons, gamemodes, even the classes themselves. Something out there will hook somebody into downloading this game.

While the game's free to install, it does open up new opportunities once you spend some money on the game. If I recall correctly, a mere 5 US dollars would add more space to your inventory, allow you full access to trading, give more types of item drops, etc.

However, there are some problems with the default settings and GUI; several key options are disabled by default, and any new player wouldn't just go straight to the options unless they've been told what settings to change right off the bat.

I would personally recommend this game, but it may take a while to get into it if you're new to the FPS genre.

I think that this is a really good game and it has become a massive part of my life.  It is far more complex than ANY other FPS game out there and has many aspects to it.  This game has an AMAZING community along with multiple really cool sub communities, such as the trading, competitive and casual community.  I highly recommend trying this game out!  The main problem with this game is that it isn't very friendly to newer players but other than that it is an AWESOME game!

Mi querido team fortress 2 saliste en el 2007 y hasta ahora sigues siendo el mismo de siempre.
 los personajes, las armas, los cosmeticos, las burlas, los comandos de voz, la historia detras de los mercenarios....todo eso es lo que te hace unico y mi juego favorito quiza te venga bien un poco de actualizaciones y algunas cosas nuevas pero aunque tengas las mismas armas desde hace 10 años y que la gente se siga volviendo loca por ellas eso es lo que te hace unico e inigualable.

Ca fait maintenant quelques années que je joue à TF2 et malgré de longues prédiodes d'absence, il est toujours là : rempli de monde, fluide, matchmaking rapide et précis et des graphismes simples mais efficace. Malgré une ou deux MaJs bateaux c'est l'un de mes jeux favoris :)
